title: Shingeki no Bahamut: Genesis - Short Story
alternative_title: 【神撃のバハムート GENESIS】 Short story, Rage of Bahamut: Genesis - Short Story
description: The short movie, labelled "Short story #1," focuses on Favaro and Kaiser between the events of the first and second series. It features Megumi Hayashibara as Favaro's mother. An episode 2 is planned.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Demons>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Magic>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
